name: Douse
description:
This is game made for the Arabic Game Jam spring 2015.

It's about an impish kid wants to anger some men calmly sitting and smoking. If you win, the men get too tired to chase you and stop their smoking. And If you lose, the older man scolds you for making a mess!

Developers:

Marwen Ounis

Daniel Leufstedt

André Leufstedt

Fia Persson

Emilia Lindholm
